article.headline: Memphis 75, TCU 69
article.story: FORT WORTH, Texas (AP) -- Sean Banks had 26 points, 13 rebounds and five blocked shots as Memphis beat TCU 75-69 on Saturday. Antonio Burks scored 17 points and Jeremy Hunt added 12 for the Tigers (14-4, 5-2 Conference USA). Corey Santee scored a season-high 21 points for TCU (7-11, 3-4), which led 67-62 with 3:38 remaining. Banks put Memphis ahead for good on a shot with 1:44 left. The game featured 18 lead changes and nine ties, but the Tigers closed the game on a 13-2 run. Marcus Shropshire scored 17 points for the Horned Frogs, and Chudi Chinweze had 15. Femi Ibikunle grabbed nine rebounds. Memphis led 36-35 at the half and had 19 second-chance points to TCU's three.
